response.original_title: Never Again - Amerikas Jugend gegen den Waffenwahn
response.overview: Newtown, Orlando, Las Vegas - every placemark is a synonym for a mass murder in the United States with at least 28 dead, committed in recent years. With weapons that the perpetrators have legally acquired - and politics is watching.
response.title: Never Again - Amerikas Jugend gegen den Waffenwahn
